column4: I have  new install of 10.4 and when I chose a screen saver they are all just black/blank - what am I missing
are you trying opengl ones, or do all of the screen savers fail?
I am trying the ones that show on the System/APreferences/Screensaves
everyone thatI have selected just shows black/blank
all that I have tries ar just black/blank
sorry I have no idea, good luck.
just tries some other - fuzzyflakes for example does work
what graphics card are you using?
this is a gateway netbook - so whatever that is - but do you think that it may be that I have an encrypted home directory
this is the one difference between this system and all the other ubuntu setups I have
in that case I can't help.  Encyrpted drives means I avoid the issue.  Good luck.  FYI to find your video card "lspci | grep -i vga" in a terminal.
I have a gateway netbook - it has an internal microphone - what do I need to do to make ubuntu see it
I have always handled encrypted systems by running the whole thing encrypted and I will return to that method it is better
i personally just think encrypted filesystems are a bad idea.  Good luck though.
y do u not like encrypted file systems?
see mbrigdan's question above - it just doesn't make sence to me for home use (business use is a different matter)
I am basically a biz user - but I would even say for home use I like it - I remember watching a dumpster diver collecting the discarded drives outside a best buy - I would bet he was after the data
